action.text: if exists(select 1 from dmkh where ma_kh = @ma_kh and cc_yn = 1) begin select rtrim(a.tk) as tk, b.ten_tk%l, rtrim(a.ma_tt) as ma_tt, c.ten_tt%l, rtrim(doi_tac) as ong_ba, rtrim(a.dia_chi) as dia_chi, rtrim(a.ma_so_thue) as ma_so_thue from dmkh a left join dmtk b on a.tk = b.tk left join dmtt c on a.ma_tt = c.ma_tt where a.ma_kh = @ma_kh return end
